description: This file defines a TodoItem component using the Lightning JS framework, representing a single to-do list item with functionalities such as toggle, edit, delete, and keyboard input handling.

classes.name: TodoItem
classes.description: A component representing a single todo list item with interactive features.

methods.name: blur
methods.description: Remove focus visual from the item.

methods.name: $toggle
methods.description: Toggle the completed state of the todo item.

methods.name: $startEdit
methods.description: Enter edit mode for the todo text.

methods.name: commitEdit
methods.description: Save edits to the todo item or delete if text is empty.

methods.name: cancelEdit
methods.description: Cancel editing and revert to the original text.

methods.name: $requestDelete
methods.description: Request deletion of the todo item.

methods.name: handleChar
methods.description: Handle character input for editing the todo text.

methods.name: moveCaretLeft
methods.description: Move the caret position left within the text.

methods.name: moveCaretRight
methods.description: Move the caret position right within the text.

methods.name: inputChar
methods.description: Handle character input events from Lightning.js, including backspace and printable characters.
